primary.context: Caller wanted to pay fees but could not find contract ID
primary.detail: AI failed to verify the account using the provided account number and transferred the caller to concierge.

steps: Caller requested to make a payment.
AI asked for name and phone number on contract.
Caller provided name but did not know the phone number on file.
AI attempted lookup via contract ID; caller offered account number or vacation ID instead.
Caller provided a long account number.
AI failed to verify the account and transferred to concierge.

impediment.detail: AI failed to verify the account after the caller provided an account number.

clarifications.note: AI clarified it can accept account number or vacation ID

actions.detail: Lookup using provided account number 872100275210 failed
Transfer to concierge after verification failure

insights.summary: The caller wanted to make a payment but didn't have their contract phone number or ID readily available. After providing an account number, the AI failed to verify the record and transferred the call to concierge.
insights.verbatim: I don't know what number I have on my contract. I've got a vacation ID. An account number, Which one do you want?
